alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:09PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central St. Charles and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 145 PM CDT... At 109 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estelle, or near Marrero, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marrero, Avondale, Harvey, Belle Chasse, Harahan, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Woodmere, River Ridge, Estelle, Bridge City, Waggaman and Elmwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines
